thread.title: Mandy Mcdonald
thread.title_full: Country House Outdoor reviewed by Mandy Mcdonald

author: Mandy Mcdonald
title: Mandy Mcdonald
text: I ordered a Barbour dress for a Burn's night supper, I needed it to be here for 21st Jan and it was but sadly the item was too small across the chest so I had to return the item. The customer service was 5* when I asked about how long dispatch would take, they answered very quickly and the delivery was spot on. I would definitely use this retailer again.
